comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Yele de Guestre. She caused a sensation at the theatre in Paris in June, 1913, when she wore a tunic with sandals, in Classical style (probably the same costume she wears here). She said she hoped that other beautiful women would follow her example. New York Times, June 29, 1913: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E07E7DD113BE633A...

comment._content: i would if they'd start producing these garments, and probably would many others  its a fine look!
